page.title: 02MORETON CHURCH SERVICES
page.content: The church stands in 3 acres, and is about 800 years old. It is dedicated to St.Mary the Virgin.St.Mary's is placed at the edge of the village. The Priest in Charge is Rev.P.Turner. The regular services are held only on Sundays. On the first Sunday in the month there is a family service. About 30 people attend this service.On the other Sundays there is either a morning service starting ay 8a.m.,or an evening service . The time of the evening service depends on the hours of daylight.The number of people at the services is between 8 and 16 . There are about 2 weddings a year,3 baptisms,and 4 funerals.Two thirds of funerals are burials and one third cremations.
